title: One-pot synthesis of carbon dots from neem resin and the selective detection of Fe(II) ions and photocatalytic degradation of toxic dyes
content:
RSC Sustain., 2024, 2,635-645
DOI: 10.1039/D3SU00404J, Paper
Open Access
Â  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution 3.0 Unported Licence.
S. Gokul Eswaran, T. Stalin, D. Thiruppathi, Manivannan Madhu, S. Santhoshkumar, Jolanta Warchol, A. Santhana Krishna Kumar, Wei-Lung Tseng, N. Vasimalai
Neem resin-derived CDs (NR-CDs) exhibited a quantum yield of 21%, allowing them for multiple applications in sensitive detection of Fe2+ ions, and also in the degradation of multiple dyes in the presence of NaBH4.
